title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to DataHub
I host data narratives that I come across. Contact: huibin.chang@berkeley.edu

title: How affluent is your county
text:
What’s the income level in your county, according to the 2021 US Census (ACS)? Per person annual income is shown in this interactive map. Note that personal income is generally lower than wage due to a portion of the population not earning wage income. Per person annual income is calculated as (for county \(i\)):
\[per\_person\_income_i = \frac{median\_family\_income_{i}}{avg\_family\_size_i}\]

title: How affluent is your county
section: The most and least affluent counties by personal income

title: How affluent is your county
text:
What’s the income level in your county, according to the 2021 US Census (ACS)? Per person annual income is shown in this interactive map. Note that personal income is generally lower than wage due to a portion of the population not earning wage income. Per person annual income is calculated as (for county \(i\)):
\[per\_person\_income_i = \frac{median\_family\_income_{i}}{avg\_family\_size_i}\]
